DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety efficacy Low Profile Visualized Intraluminal Support ( LVIS™ LVIS™ Jr. ) device MicroVention , Inc. use facilitate endovascular coil wide-necked intracranial aneurysm coil .
DOC.brief_title: Pivotal Study LVIS ( Low Profile Visualized Intraluminal Support )
DOC.criteria: Subject age 18 75 year Subject unruptured rupture ( > 30days since occurence ) , widenecked ( neck ≥4mm dome neck ratio < 2 ) intracranial saccular aneurysm ( < 20mm maximum diameter plane ) Subject significant extra intracranial stenosis parent artery ( > 50 % ) proximal target aneurysm . Subject condition opinion treat physician would place subject high risk embolic stroke Subject contraindication use antiplatelet agent Subject unable complete require followup
